Instruction: 'Toast the English muffins until golden brown.'
While the muffins are toasting, heat a skillet over medium heat and cook the Canadian bacon until lightly browned.'

'Poach the eggs: Bring a pot of water to a gentle simmer. Crack each egg into a small bowl and carefully slide them into the simmering water. Poach for about 3-4 minutes until the whites are set but the yolks are still runny.'
'Remove the poached eggs with a slotted spoon and drain on a paper towel.'
'Assemble the Eggs Benedict: Place a slice of Canadian bacon on each toasted English muffin half.'
